values:
so. i'm single. but anyway....

this weekend i went to Caseys! it was really funnie/fun. we babysat. and we talked alot saturday night. felt good to let some out. but yeah. i don't have much to say.

hmmm... he's sexy. very sexy.

ah.. i wanna go to the lake so bad today. but i'm scared. scared because of this burn thing on my stummie. and scared of the memories it's going to bring back. scared that HE might be there. and if HE is i will die especially if HE has HER. agh i dunno what to do. i wanna go but i can't. maybe i need to go and face my fears and know i'm going to be okay with going there. ah. i'm so scared of today. but i need to have fun.

*Everything gets hotter when the sun goes down* --aw yeah ain't that the truth ;)

agh. i haven't updated in awhile. so lifes been kinda icky. i dunno. i did that salting thing and it's so disguisting i hate it so much. i look at it and i'm like EW. thats ugly. i pray it goes away soon, very soon at that. i HATE HATE HATE it. very much. i wanna tell mom, but how? what would i say? i dunno anymore. its like it's all going downward once again. but oh well. i talked to matt the other day, felt good to let my feelings out to a guy that actually understood. thats the one great thing about him, he understands and i don't confuse him too much. 

so i've been thinking. wouldn't life be better if people stopped pretending? stop pretending to be happy when their really sad, stop pretending to like someone you hate. stop pretending to be somebody you're not. if i learned one thing this year its who i am. in the past i didn't know who i was or what i liked, but i finally figured it out. i know who i am and i know what matters to me and what doesn't. people need to take time to figure themselves out and stop being so fake. 

hmm nothing else to ramble about... prolly will tommorow. or maybe later tonight. 

*much love*

ooh yeah. got new stuff today with evie. yay. no spanish! it was classic.

[Intro]
I don't understand why
See it's burning me to hold onto this
I know this is something I gotta do
But that don't mean I want to
What I'm trying to say is that I-love-you I just
I feel like this is coming to an end
And its better for me to let it go now than hold on and hurt you
I gotta let it burn

[Verse 1]
It's gonna burn for me to say this
But it's comin from my heart
It's been a long time coming
But we done been fell apart
Really wanna work this out
But I don't think you're gonna change
I do but you don't
Think it's best we go our separate ways
Tell me why I should stay in this relationship
When I'm hurting baby
I ain't happy baby
Plus theres so many other things I gotta deal with
I think that you should let it burn

Now it's too late
I know she ain't comin back
What I gotta do now
To get my shorty back
Ooo ooo oooh
Man I don't know what I'm gonna do
Without my booo

It's been e-leven days, ump-teen hours
Im'ma be burnin' till you return (let it burn)

They say beauty kills... i wish i was beautiful.

YESTERDAY- Johnny came down and we went to go get April from his house. it was crazy. we got there and got her then came back here. they got all me all ready for the formal. it was crazy. April talked to Doug and the was like she's gonna make you look like a grandma! i was laughing. we had so much fun getting me ready. and then ooh joy.. pictures. April took a picture of me putting my deoderant on! lol it was funny. and she took some of me being a silly muffin. then amanda got here and we had to take pictures. goodness. too many pictures. then we went to the school. the car was crazy. it always is. the dance wasn't too great but it wasn't like horrible. it was crazy. agh. i HATE taking pictures though. they suck. oh well. we came home and got undressed and washed our faces then BED time. yeah today has been ick. talk to you later!

gaaaaaah! i dunno. yesterday mom picked me up in civics. yay i love madre. and we went to c-ville. joy... to daddys work. but it's okay cause his boss loves me and got me yummie food and offered to let me chat away but it was only like 2:50 and nobody woulda been home. so oh well. 

today- aggh. the formal. i guess i should be super very excited but i'm not really that excited about it. not even sure i want to be there. i don't wanna be all dressed up and pretty. cause even if i look pretty i still won't feel pretty and it'll make me sad. but kelly amanda markie and mitchell will be there. hope it's fun. i just have this weird feeling about it. which isn't good. but oh well. 

me and jara were talking today. and boys they just want sex. they never want the girl that loves them. and they are never happy enough. goodness. i'm trying hard to be enough for you mitchell. i hope i don't dissapoint you. 

i need to stop listening to burn. it's the i was listening to when me and matt broke up and the song mitchell asked me out to. HOPEFULLY it won't be the song mitchell and me break up to, if we break up. i really hope we don't. :( 

done with all this for now. maybe after the formal or on Sunday? who knows.. love you guys who care about me.

HOLA SEXI PANTS!!!

its me!!!

u wrote the date wrong!!! again!!

ur gonna be tardy....IM GONNA BE NAKED!!

haha....ur so awsome sara and my bestestest buddy ever!!!

u and mitchell r awsome....stay with himmmmmm

i suppose ill go tho....later giggle-bear

okay. so i do cut. i do it too get away. it helps me ease my pain. and i know all of you have a problem with it. i do too. but it's just something i DO. and i'm sorry. no i'm not psyco cause i cut. there's just so many things none of you know about me. you people are so fucking quick to judge. you don't understand and you never will. so just let me live my life its my body my scars my mistakes. let me deal. 

love. agh. is it really worth it? you know you mean everything to me. and i hope this little situation we are in doesn't end us. because you know you make me happy and i feel like we've got something. it's like i'm giving you everything and you don't even know how much i need you. i just wish i could tell you everything on my mind but i don't think you'd understand. i know i'm not the perfect girlfriend and i mess up. but i know that i love you more then any other girl you'll ever have. and i'm gonna try my hardest to make you happy. i'm sorry i'm not perfect. i'm sorry i mess up. but you and i both know i'm not perfect. because nobody is. but baby, you are my heart. and i love you. may seem hard to believe. but it's true. 

okay. so today i was walking home from the bus stop. and i looked down at my wrist. and mark you are right. it's ugly and i can't look at it and be happy. looking down at my wrist and seeing all those cuts and scars makes me feel so ugly and unwanted. i wish they weren't there. it's just a reminder of everything. it hurts. i'm tired of hurting. agh. i'm so worthless and ugly. on the inside and the outside.

thats it for now. maybe more when i can see better. damn tears. 

Is there anything worth looking for? Worth loving for? Worth lying for? Is there anything worth waiting for? Worth living for? Worth dying for?

too many silly conversations today. they're great.

yo yo yo. whats up my home gees? well yesterday was SILLY. me and amanda walked up the road with Princess n Gypsy n Gypsy got in a fight with another dog! and the lady was all like "GET YOUR DOGS OFF MY PROPERTY!" haha yea right my dog is kick ass. then we chilled here and talked to Chrystal and the baby even though the baby cant talk lol. The baby farted REALLY loud omg it made me water!! n Took pictures of Ryan and John. lol we went up to jouett at 5 to meet the prom gang which consist of :: Caroline, John, Whitney, Rayleigh, David, Sara, Chelsea, Cirus, Jenny and Tommy.

Then to the MALL we go! haha it was sooooo funn! we tried on skirts at forever 21... we almost ripped one of em! lol and Amandas ASS wouldnt fit in the other one. it sucked. but we went to guess and found 2 skirts we liked a lot.. lol in the dressin room we were fightin! i was like I LOVE THIS ONE and she was like I LOVE THIS ONE! it was funnie. we ended up with the one Amanda LOVED cause i LOVE it too! lol its grooovy! we toooook like 30 minutes finding shoes. lol i don't even adore the shoes either. then we went to IHOP... do you hop!? lol ommmmg it was crazy! we were SO LOUD! it was whoa! "She has a big gap!" them mom gave me this look and i was like "The gap between her teeth!" and Amanda n Mom CRACKED up. i was so lost and they wouldnt stop laughin. i felt confused. we had fun though. then back at the house we chilled ya know ya know. lol later for now. 

LOOOOVE YOU GUYS! specially my suga Mitchy! lol

wow 3 good days in a row. i like this. i really do. now i just need to not be so tired all the time and it'll be all okay. proms tommorow.. john and caroline are going to be so lovely. they are the most wonderful couple ever. i'm so jealous. i wish me and mitchell were wonderful and lovely like them, maybe one day. haha... a girl can dream can't she?

so today was pretty crazy. i didn't do any pullups in gym. i'm so weak. but i did 62 situps.. haha better then Dylan and Daniel P! oh yea! go me. Math was fun after the test. i put aliminum foil on my stummie it was fun! lol then i gave it to mitchell n he threw it away. meanie! english-boring. spanish-alright i guess. Bobcat was the same ol' same ol'.. i got to go in Mrs Marshall to talk to daniel for a minute and Daniel P threw ice at me! lol it was funnie. on the bus i fell asleep.. sorry mark! lol i was tired. I'm so happy to be happy again. and i owe most of my happiness to Mitchell. yay. :) i love him bunchies! 

well i'm gone. looooove you all!

yessss! i'm okay. haven't been sad in 2 days! yeah bitch count that.. 2 DAYS! oh yes! i'm okay. i'm okay. yes! well lets hope this happiness last.. :) its great. anyways... the game yesterday was CRAZY! me manda n ande got in trouble. i swear ima trouble maker lol. it was fun chillin with mr. bowles though! andes the sneaky one.. lol. i'm just weird. we chillled with mitchy n chris at the game n case some too. haha Matt was there. EWW! lol he's so not cool. i think he's jealous cause he isn't nearly as great as Mitchell is. poor guy. lol Amanda spent the night last night too. it was CRAZY i swear she never let me go to sleep! lol n she took the catapillar to school omg. lol. 

art today- haha i punched Bryan and he hurt his leg. haha. Dylan n Bryan were sitting on the counters doing there projects it was funnie looking. the rest of the day went by good. 

Mitchell-i loove you so friggen much! you make me happy in so many ways, it's great.

*Every moment with you is a moment i treasure..

It's been a bad day,
another bad day and all I want to do is look at you and know I'm okay.
From where I'm sitting these shoes ain't fitting and I'm walking backwards,
looking down, don't see the sky I see the ground.

Above
below you look and so you wonder,
where the time has gone of looking up, tomorrows on its way.
Above
below you look and so you say,
when I wake up in the morning is it 'gonna be another ugly day?

She sits in church its 2 pm and look whose back from work again.
I guess they thought your better off, without this life, without a job.
From where I'm sitting these shoes ain't fitting and I'm going nowhere,
killing time, just trying to feed my bleeding mind.

It's been a bad day,
another bad day and I cross my heart and hope to die
these dreams of yours are 'gonna fly.

agh. what the fuck is wrong with me? i swear. one minute i'm fine, the next i'm like crying. 

i hate being the follow up. i'm never good enough. i'm always second best, never first. i just wish that i was better then you for ONCE. everything i try to do you do better. Everybody loves you, you're spectacular. compared to you i'm nothing. i mean look at you... you're good at EVERYTHING. Track, Football, Baseball, Schoool, you've got tons of friends, a great girlfriend you've been with for 3 fucking years. and look at me. i can't even make honor roll, nobody wants to be with me for 3 years because i'm worthless. nothing but a big mistake. and i'm tired of feeling this way. i'm tired of being everyones second favorite, for once i wanna be better then you. 

gosh. i have soooo much shit on my mind. i dunno anymore. i WILL not cut though. thats a promise. i think, i hope.

and HD-FUCK YOU. plain and simple. my god. im TIRED of you fucking with my mind. it's done. i'm not going to waste anymore time thinking about you from now on. 

there's so much more in my mind but it's not like any of you care to read what i feel. so whatever.

today i went to get ice cream with my cousin Johnny n Joe. we went driving around it was CRAZY! im beat Joe up too... lol "my butts sweatin!" .. i swear you're mean Joe! it was fun. we spun tires like whoa. and we almost died... well not really but i got scared. yeah now i'm home again. i'm so bored. i think i might take a shower soon and eat. laters!

Friday-wow it was crazy! we stayed after for the track meet. um Amanda Ande n Rachel spent the night! it was CRAZZZZZZY! haha gas relief lmbo! Ryan came "whats all that ruckus in there?" loord. at the meet me and manda gave each other piggy back rides. it was so CRAZY! i fell on Amanda. i got pissed too. i HATE logan, daniel, and well i don't hate stephen anymore. and i hate "someone" that shall go unnamed. Rachels a party pooper. me n ando kisssed lol. 

Saturday- CRAZY! me and amanda went out playin in tha rain! haha it was crazy. we walked down the road in our pjs and this person looked all crazy at us! we watched Blue Crush but i fell asleep. Rachel wouldnt come with us!! we had to go by ourselves but it was funnie. We danced to YEAH! lol REALLLY loud. the bass made a stinky smell too. lmbo. today was too funnie. yeah theres alot more that happened just too much too type and it would bore ya'll. haha so peace!

we take so many things for granted. justin really got me thinking today. he said everytime he eats he feels guilty because someone somewhere else needs that food more then he does. and if he doesn't eat it all hes wasting it. seriously, we take so many things for granted in life. here i am spoiled too death, and i never think that theres people out there that have nothing. i sit here and think that i'm ugly, stupid, and have nobody. when really i'm not that ugly, i'm just not beautiful. i'm not stupid. and i have the most wonderful friends that put up with me when i'm depressed, friends that let me cry on their shoulders, friends that put up with everything I do. and i love them. but i never take the time to thank anybody for anything. i take it all for granted. when one thing goes wrong i think "damn my life sucks" but there's SO many people that have it 100 times worse. i have everything i want and STILL i want more. gosh i'm selfish.

today- agh today. i cried. agh! crying does ease the pain. but i hate crying infront of people because everyones like WHATS WRONG... and its annoying. first off.. if somethings wrong and you don't usually talk or care about me then why the fuck are you gonna come talk to me when i'm crying? i seriously hate that. it's like oh she's upset lets find out whats wrong. i'm so tired of people faking. if you don't care, don't act like you do. 

okay. simple as this - i love mitchell. it may not be so called "real" love but what is "real" love anyway? i don't want anybody else. not logan, not bryan, not dylan, not matt. not anybody but HIM. just want to make that clear. i don't know why i like mitchell so much i just do. it's crazy, but then again love IS crazy. 

amanda and emma-ya'll are wonderful. thanks so much. and amanda don't worry i won't kill myself lol. atleast not on PURPOSE. gosh! i love you two!

dude today was groovy. logan forgot my flowers!! roar! OH YEA! lmbo Bryan. Today Civics was INSANE! we had Jimmys mom as a sub and Dilly was being CRAZY! i swear. Dillys a funny guy! well yeah i don't really wanna go into detail about today but it was pretty good. 

track- we ran trials, 3-300s n 4-200s then chilled n watched the high school meet. lol ande n cadie thanks for holdin up the hoodies so i could put pants on! lol. Cadie was pimpin them glasses lol. my track girls are groovy! yea buddy. well must go now.

i heart mitchy*poo!

haha today was actually GOOD. yeah you heard me. GOOD. hah. the best part of course was the meet. on the bus i sat with ande like always n emma sat infront of us. hell yea! it was silly.. which it always is. but we had to ride 2 different buses (sadness!) haha we didn't have to compete against nobody cause it was just Louisa Girls. i swear Fork Union boys gotta be GAY. lawwwd. haha. Mitchells a HOOKER lmbo Ande.. nobody wants him though! LICK! we finally got our ice cream! Rohan-i HATE YOU. you're gonna get it. i promise. haha I FOUND a four leaf clover and i was all excited and i felt special. go me! see i swear i'm just good luck. haha. well i dunno what else to write. just so much happened i can't put it all in here. hehe. so peace up.. atown down! haha later. 

i love mitchell.. he's my sexy hooker.. haha. (haha ande.. can u handle it? i don't think he can... lol)

okay listen up you fucking faggots that can't accept that i'm HAPPY with Mitchell. keep talking the shit, keep thinking its doing something because you know what it's not doing anything. it's just giving me more reasons to be with him. and you know what? no matter how fucking HARD you try i will not listen to the shit your saying. because thats stupid. so many relationships get ruined over stupid shit like that. and i'm not gonna let it happen. so STOP fucking trying. stop saying he pops boners off guys, stop saying he's gay, stop saying EVERYTHING its fucking STUPID and IMMATURE. i'm just so fucking sick of it. 

cause we lost it all
and nothing last forever
i'm sorry i can't be perfect
now it's just too late
and we can't go back
i'm sorry i can't be perfect

i love you Mitchy, can't nobody fucking change that no matter how hard they try.

we all make mistakes. i simply hate myself for the mistakes i've made in the past. i wish i could forget everything and just live for the moment. but thats just not me. i remember every stupid little thing i've done wrong. i hate it. i hate the fact that i don't love myself because i wish so much that i could accept who i am. maybe one day i'll learn to. but until i do i've got to keep myself under control and not do stupid things. scars aren't beautiful, i hate my scars. everytime i look at them i'm reminded of all the times i hated myself, of all the mistakes i've made. i'm stupid. stupid for hurting myself, stupid for thinking nobody cares about me. thank you to everyone who gets mad at me when i cut, thank you to everyone who gives a damn about me. and i'm sorry. sorry for being me, sorry for not thinking about ya'll while i'm hurting myself. thank you for not ever giving up on me and one day i'll learn to not give up on myself too.

so i haven't updated in AGES. seriously. but anyways. i'll start from thursday?
Thursday- pretty good day i guess. we had a track meet at harrisonburg. laawd. the ride up was silly. ande and cadie.. HONK! lol i touuuch myself! loord. haha ande-beckys eyes are 2 Different colors! and listening to the church music lol. the meet was okay i guess. i did okay 3:13 isn't THAT bad.. i coulda done better but whatever. the ride home mitchell came back n sat with me n savannah. crazy people. thats all i can say bout the bus.
FRIDAY- wow today was good eh? Manda wasn't at school again. but all my classes were really easy today. cept' Mr. Walkowiak my "so called best friend" was yelling at me in Health! but oh well. the dance sucked. but i go with mitchell. omg wow yes i love him. lol. anyway thats all for now. peace homes.

"Real life ain't no fairy, I just thought you should know." -Yellowcard


I've accepted that we can't be, but I've also accepted that you're going to be that one person I carry with me for the rest of my life, the one that I always going to make my heart jump a little and my stomach tie up in knots no matter how happy I am otherwise and no matter how long it's been. The one I will always secretly wish had asked me to the dance even though I am more than happy with the guy that did. Do you realize how incredibly difficult it is to accept both those things at once? It's a completely torturous situation if you stop and think about it.

You're so hard to talk to. You mean the world to me, but I don't know how to say it and to actually get a response from you.
I WISH I COULD FUCKING SLIT MY WRIST RIGHT NOW. agh! i hate myself. i hate myself. i fucking hate myself so much! gosh why am i such a fuckup?

agh- so today was okay. 

maybe i'm not supose to be in love. maybe i'm meant to be alone. but all i know is right now i want you. i need you to be here- holding me.

You forgive me for missing you so, and i'll forgive you for being cold, You forgive me for the loud racing of my heart, and i'll forgive you for not hearing it, You forgive me for playing your games, and i'll forgive you for toying with my emotions, You forgive me for wanting to be with you, and i'll forgive you for avoiding me, You forgive me for being so pathetic, and i'll forgive you for taking advantage of it, You forgive me for not being able to let go, and i'll forgive you for never having latched on, You forgive me for having hopes and dreams, and i'll forgive you for crushing them. 

-hd...agh..-

Isn't it funny how you can think you're completely over someone but if you drive past his house, stumble upon a meaningful song you both shared, or even get a glance of him on the street....just in an instant, it can change all that? And you start to remember the pain. And that hollow space is feeling more and more like the Grand Canyon with every second that goes by. But you bury these feelings deep down, so deep that you're sure no one will be able to tell. To the outside world, you smile and act like nothing is wrong. Everything's just perfect. For that split second that you've locked eyes, a tiny whisper says 'make this last forever, only and just this moment forever and ever'. But after a second or so, you go along your own merry way, all the while realizing how much you do miss him, how much you still love him...and it sticks with you for days, weeks, maybe months, until fate decides to hand you another one of those unexpected moments. And then you finally understand the worst feeling in the world is when the person you love most is standing right next to you, yet you can never have them. Try as you may, you can't make someone love you.

emotions going fucking wild... what to do? who to turn to? agh i don't fucking know. i give up. wanna leave this fucking town...escape from myself. but it'll never happen. i'll just be stuck being my miserable self forever.

Suicide isn't the answer to your problems


Ask the 25-year-old who tried to electricute himself. He lived. But both his arms are gone.


What about jumping? Ask John. He used to be intelligent, with an engaging sense of humor. That was before he leapt from a building. Now, he's brain-damaged and will always need care. He staggers and has seizures. He lives in a fog. But, worst of all, he KNOWS he used to be normal.


What about pills? Ask the 12-year-old with extensive liver damage from an overdose. Have you ever seen anyone die of liver damage? You turn yellow. It's a hard way to go.


What about a gun? Ask the 24-year-old who shot himself in the head. Now he drags one leg, has a useless arm and has no vision or hearing on one side. He lived through his "foolproof" suicide. You might too.


But... Who will clean your blood off the carpet or scrape your brains from the ceiling? Commercial cleaning companies may refuse that job--but SOMEONE has to do it.


Who will have to cut you down from where you hung yourself or identify your bloated body after you've drowned? Your father? Your mother? Your wife? Your son?


The carefully worded "loving" suicide note is of no help. Those who loved you will NEVER completely recover. They'll feel regret and an unending pain.


Suicide is contagious. Look around your family. Look closely at the 4 year old playing with his cars on the rug. Kill yourself tonight, and he may do it ten years from now.


You DO have other choices. There are people who can help you through this crisis. Call a hotline. Call a friend. Call your minister or priest. Call a doctor or hospital. Call the police. They will tell you that there's hope. Maybe you'll find it in the mail tomorrow. Or in a phone call this weekend. But what you're seeking could be just a minute, a month, or a day away.


You say you don't want to be stopped? Still want to do it? -Well, then, I may see you in the psychiatric ward later. And we'll work with whatever you have left.


Remember: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem.
